description: K a t u v   s h a m   ( g l o s s e s   o n   Z e r a h i a h   b e n   I s a a c   h a - L e v i   G e r o n d i ' s   S e f e r   h a - M a ʼ o r ,   o n   T a l m u d   B a v l i   G i ṭ i n ,   Y e v a m o t ,   K e t u b o t ,   t h e   t h r e e   B a v o t ,   S a n h e d r i n   a n d   M a k o t )
title: Katuv sham (glosses on Zerahiah ben Isaac ha-Levi Gerondi's Sefer ha-Maʼor, on Talmud Bavli Giṭin, Yevamot, Ketubot, the three Bavot, Sanhedrin and Makot)
author: Abraham ben David, of Posquières
